creator: chezhiyan@siptech.co.in
text:
An FTP Request Sampler was added to the testplan and was configured to use 
a server IP, username and password. The test plan was executed and it 
worked perfectly. 
The FTP Request Sampler was selected to change the username/password/IP 
address. But on execution it is found that the sampler still takes the old 
values. The new values provided does not take effect.
(nightly/2003-03-16)
